name: Smart Recruit
description: An AI-based resume parser that provides candidate profiling and suitability scoring for job descriptions, delivering a complete end-to-end recruitment workflow from job posting to candidate shortlisting.
role: Led the team in developing AI-assisted Parsing, Profiling, and Scoring APIs
Designed the Parsing API architecture following best practices and Test-Driven Development (TDD) using Python's unittest framework
Designed multiple modules including PDF parsing, resume structure extraction, sort order correction, template-based parsing, scoring, and rating modules
Implemented NLP techniques using fine-tuned spaCy NER (BERT) models for keyword extraction
Led R&D efforts to prepare training data for fine-tuning spaCy NER models
Developed a machine learning model for classifying CVs using style and formatting features
